alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:25PM MST until July 26 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 623 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near central to northern Tucson, moving west at 15 to 20 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was noted near Vail. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, Vail, South Tucson, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Summit, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Valencia West, Catalina Foothills and Corona De Tucson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
